name: wscat
readme:
# wscat

WebSocket cat.

## Installation

This module needs to be installed globally so use the `-g` flag when installing:

```
npm install -g wscat
```

## Usage

```
$ wscat -c ws://echo.websocket.org 
connected (press CTRL+C to quit)
> hi there
< hi there
> are you a happy parrot?
< are you a happy parrot?
```
